products.name: Dancing Butterfly
products.description: This spinner starts its performance with a beautiful spray fountain, then surprisingly finishes with a barrage of six jumping red and green baby ground bloom spinners.

products.name: Saturn Ring Eruption
products.description: Saturn shape spinner with silver ring and crackling finale.

products.name: Triple Whistler
products.description: Three-stage whistling bottle rocket with report. You will love this one!

products.name: Four Horseman Rocket
products.description: This one flies fast and high! Powerful aerial action has excellent lift and super-charged colorful burst.

products.name: Wolfpack Missle Base
products.description: Five effects: fiery tail, crackle, color burst, silver glitter, yellow peony.

products.name: Crackling Ball
products.description: Round firecracker-type ball with crackling and flashing effects.

products.name: Wolfpack Snaps
products.description: Kids favorite trick noisemaker. 200 snaps per box.

products.name: Tank W/R
products.description: Combat simulation. This tank has wheels and moves in a forward motion shooting sparks and bombs. Lots of fun!
